definition: to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode

sentences.english: Plant lectins are widely distributed in plant kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 植物凝集素广泛分布于植物界。

sentences.english: The cell at the top is at prophase, showing the condensing chromosomes prior to their separation.
sentences.chinese: 上面的细胞处于分裂前期，凝集的染色体将要分开。

sentences.english: Preliminary results of studies on the specificity of a lectin from Trichosanthess were reported.
sentences.chinese: 本文对天花粉凝集素的糖结合特性，进行了初步研究。

sentences.english: Con A agglutination test was positive in the three treatments making an identification of cell transformation effect.
sentences.chinese: 刀豆球蛋白A凝集试验进一步验证了细胞转化结果。

sentences.english: In the venom of Trimeresurus stejnegeri exists a C type animal lectin.
sentences.chinese: 竹叶青蛇毒中存在一个C类动物凝集素。

sentences.english: By using globin lipoplast, the authors established latex agglutination test to determine occult blood.
sentences.chinese: 本文应用珠蛋白脂质体建立了胶乳凝集实验测便潜血。

sentences.english: Lectins were found in the fruit of Daucus carota L. (Wild carrot) and Apium L. (Celery).
sentences.chinese: 发现野胡萝卜果实与芹菜果实中有凝集素。

sentences.english: The results showed that PTL-channels werecation selective.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，半夏凝集素形成的通道为阳离子通道。

sentences.english: The leguminous lectin played an important role in the recognition of Rhizobia .
sentences.chinese: 豆科植物凝集素在对根瘤菌的识别中起重要作用。

sentences.english: Lactose and galactose could inhibit the haemagglutination activity of snail agglutinin.
sentences.chinese: 其凝集活性能被半乳糖和乳糖抑制。

sentences.english: It is the a bunch of irregular cell agglutinates which is agglutinated by Red blood cell.
sentences.chinese: 红细胞彼此凝集成一簇簇不规则的细胞团。

sentences.english: The research reported on applying plate agglutination test to diagnose pheasant tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 本项研究应用平板凝集试验诊断雉鸡结核病。

sentences.english: Methods The host animal in epidemic area was investigated through direct culture of the pathogen and hemagglutination test.
sentences.chinese: 方法用病原培养和血清凝集试验调查疫区宿主动物。

sentences.english: Ammonium sulfate deposition were used to get kidney bean phytohemagglutinin.
sentences.chinese: 用硫酸铵沉淀法得到芸豆植物凝集素。

sentences.english: Studied the selecting method of agglutinating nature yeast on alcohol fermentation.
sentences.chinese: 研究了酒精发酵凝集性酵母菌的筛选方法。

sentences.english: The lectin of cottons exist in their cotyledon and embryo.
sentences.chinese: 棉花凝集素贮存在种子子叶和胚中。

definition: to condense/to coagulate/coacervation (i.e. form tiny droplets)/aggregation/coherent
to pour into/perfusion (med.)/to concentrate one's attention on/to teach/to inculcate/to instill
variant of 凝練|凝练[ning2 lian4]
dissociation/to break up a chemical compound into its elements
to dissipate everywhere (of light, sound, gas etc)
